sentences.sentence: Before the night come, she shall hie her to the Tower.
sentences.translation: 天黑以前，得送她上塔楼去。

sentences.sentence: When the charm is around her, and the spell has bound her. Hie away!
sentences.translation: 当魔咒在她身边，把她束缚住的时候，快跑！

sentences.sentence: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.translation: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。
